sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { FileText, FileSpreadsheet, Presentation, Image as ImageIcon, File, Video, Upload, Search, MoreHorizontal, Download, Trash2, Clock, ChevronRight, HardDrive } from "lucide-react"; import { motion } from "framer-motion"; const FilesPage: React.FC = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(""); const fileCategories = [ { name: "Reports", count: 12, icon: , color: "bg-blue-100 text-blue-600" }, { name: "Spreadsheets", count: 8, icon: , color: "bg-emerald-100 text-emerald-600" }, { name: "Keynotes", count: 5, icon: , color: "bg-purple-100 text-purple-600" }, { name: "Assets", count: 24, icon: , color: "bg-pink-100 text-pink-600" }, { name: "Hardcopy", count: 10, icon: , color: "bg-amber-100 text-amber-600" }, { name: "Motion", count: 4, icon:
